EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ ReliatraN ™SIDT
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ ReliatraN ™SIDT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ ReliatraiN ™SIDT.
ReliatraN® Transformers production technology developed by DuPont meets the most severe safety and environmental requirements.
ReliatraN® is a brand for dry type power transformers with open winding.
ReliatraN® Transformers’ overload capacity, insulation reliability, environmental friendliness, fire safety, climatic service conditions and other characteristics are superior to other devices of its class.
For more information, please refer to the DuPont website or call 877-713-1299.
http://www2.dupont.com/Nomex_Energy_Solutions/en_IN/products/reliatran.html
DuPont Protection Solutions
